GSD.product_version: versions from v3.12 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
memstick/ms_block: Fix a memory leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 39be95d1ff7b44c1e969af72ba9da7332dfcc1da, it was introduced in version v3.12 by commit 0ab30494bc4f3bc1ea4659b7c5d97c5218554a63. For more details please see the references link.
